queries.item: CREATE TABLE `?:staff` ( `person_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `email` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `gender` varchar(1) NOT NULL default '', `country` varchar(2) NOT NULL default '', `state` varchar(32) default '', `city` varchar(255) default '', PRIMARY KEY (`person_id`), ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:staff_descriptions` ( `person_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `name` varchar(128) NOT NULL default '', `post` varchar(128) NOT NULL default '', `description` text, `lang_code` char(2) NOT NULL default 'EN', ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;
